string-array.name: changelog
string-array.item: Y\'all have sent me 6000+ icon requests!
So I added the most popular requests:

- Call of Duty (181 requests) - Zoom (135 requests) - PhonePe (97 requests) - Free Fire (75 requests) - MEGA (68 requests) - Airtel (68 requests) - Mobile Legends: Bang (65 requests) - FM Radio (63 requests) - Among Us (54 requests) - and some more!
I\'m opening up public contributions to Appstract. If you\'re interested in contributing icons, check out Appstract on Github
I also switched to a maintained fork of CandyBar Dashboard, many thanks to Sarsa Murmu!
Lastly, I updated bindings for other popular apps.
